评论详情: I love you can dress up or down this dress. It's not see through and the material thickness is perfect, flows very well on my body and love the pockets.
Loooved the color but not true to size. Thick material, very nice overall
This is so flattering!!! The wrap does a great job of hiding your tummy, the length is great (compared to lots of super short dresses out there), and the material is nice and has a great color.
Comfortable for every day wear, and very flattering. 10/10

评论概述: Actually love this simple summer dress
评论详情: I also bought a brown dress same style. But this orange color was too screamy red-orange. Was hoping for a more dusty/toned down orange. So returned for that reason.
Love this dress. It was perfect for a party. It fit perfectly and I got so many compliments. It is the perfect weight and thickness and didn't seem to wrinkle when sitting. Great value for the money.

I got this to wear for a maternity style and it is very flattering and I even like the color but the fabric quality is only fair. I am 5’6 and weigh about 160 and four months pregnant and I got a large.

I bought this dress to go from casual day to dressier evening events for a trip to London and Croatia.It was stupid hot this summer in Europe.  And thankfully the dress did not add to my misery.  The slight ruching and tie front were super flattering as I definitely have a curvy, hourglass shape.  I like that it showed off my figure yet was modest at the same time.  But it didn't make me feel like I was wearing a frumpy sack.  Bought this in gray. Looks fantastic with silver jewelry.I would buy more in other colors.  True to size
Love this dress! I ordered it in two colors - perfect for school!
Super cute and can be dressed up or down depending on what you wear with it. Comfort of a T-shirt dress with just enough elevation that you can wear to work, etc. Will be ordering in other colors!
Pretty dress. Kind of thin material. You should wear black undies with the yellow
Wore for a wedding. Very comfortable and felt very pretty! Soft material, true to size.

I loved the fitting in this dress so much that I bought a different color immediately! I bought a size small and with the belt on the front creates a really nice figure! I’m a 5.4 135 lb size small fit great! 👍🏻

Everyone needs a little black dress! I was afraid this dress would not work for what I needed. Boy was I wrong! Great quality, light weight , steam to Great wrinkles out. Very versatile- can dress up with heals or dress down with tennis shoes and maybe Jean jacket. Can not beat this dress for price. Worth every penny!

I wanted this to be a chic alternative for casual, running-around-with-kids attire, but I'm not going to do that without underwear on, so I had to return it. Flattering silhouette-5 star, wearability-1 star.

Not at all flattering looked terrible and the dress looks cheap the fabric was not great. Dont buy! I returned mine immediately

Great dress for the money. Fabric drapes well and doesn't wrinkle. I'm a tall, solid girly, but the wrap area fits right at my natural waist and minimizes the pooch nicely. Can dress it up or down with the right shoes and accessories.
Very flattering. I get a lot of compliments when I wear it. Bought it in teal a few months ago and now I purchases light red.

I love this dress! It’s casual but can also be dressed up. It hugs all the right curves without showing the wrong ones. It is so comfortable and the perfect length. I am 5’3, 175 lbs and got a Large. I will definitely be getting another color!

I love this dress! It complements my curves and I love the style.
This dress looks fabulous but it is only in my cart and I haven't even purchased it yet.  Amazon is a little "cart before the horse" on this.  I will review it once I buy it.
Beautiful dress! Fits great. Length is also great. I’m 5’3” and 125 pounds. Wish I could purchase in every color!!

Love this dress it would be even nicer if they made it for petites I got one medium and one large and the larger works better for me. If you have a tummy no problem. It hides everything if you’re in between sizes, please go up..
Absolutely love this dress. Super flattering and oh so comfortable

Fits beautifully and looks great

Good dress, would definitely recommend

Love this. It is exactly as the photo shows. Going to a wedding!

评论概述: Wonderful fit on just about any body type!

Loved this dress! Only thing I’m not a fan of is the slit on the side, but it’s not a big enough factor for me to dislike this dress. I love the tie, I love the feel, I love the look!
Have this in 3 colors, super soft, comfortable, and looks great on - tons of compliments

This dress fits true to size.  I love the lightweight material.  The tie on the side is very complimentary and hides any unflattering rolls.  The height of the slits is the perfect height.  I love the fit and design.  Great price!  I would buy more in different colors.

The tie waist is very flattering, but the dress runs small, so I would suggest sizing up. But the material has a lot of elasticity, and if you like a very close fit, the material will stretch so order your usual size.
Baggy & unflattering

I was looking for a versatile gray dress and ordered this one.  Color wasn't exactly what I was looking for but close enough. I love the fit and softness of the material and the fact that it can be dressed up or dressed down. It's a comfortable dress, a little longer, and the side tie at the waist is adjustable.  I'm 5'8" and almost 190 lbs and I ordered a 2X, personally I like the fit because I don't like anything tight or clingy technically I could have gone down a size but figured q could just tighten the tie waist and not have to worry if it shrinks. However, if you want to wear it in a more body-con style then you should definitely go down a size. Only thing I didn't like is the packaging because it came a rumpled mess, hence the 4 stars and not 5.

评论概述: I HAVE IT IN 7 COLOURS but 1 came stained with deodorant
评论详情: I bought this dress to wear as work from home outfits. - listen its THE most versatile dress you can add to your wardrobe. When it went on sale at $24.99 down from $38 I grabbed more.....and if prices drop further...ill get the lighter colours. The light colours will need a slip as its thinner buti stuck to darker tones. But its form fitting, hugs curves without it being vulgar, breathable and i can dress it up for errands, a bbq, or pack for vacation. My new favourite dress. I want all. I took away a star though because 1 came stained with deodorant...ew.
I’m short and the waist hit me in the wrong place in the dress so had to return.  Otherwise very cute dress.

评论概述: Super comfortable and hugs in all the right places
评论详情: Ordered this dress based on previous reviews on comfort and overall wear.  It’s a very forgiving fabric that isn’t see through.  It’s very comfortable and fits me in all the right places.  I ordered a large and it is comfortable on my larger arms and wide hips.  Would recommend this to anyone looking for a beautiful and comfortable dress.
Fits true to size. The tie allows for some shape to the dress. Great casual summer/beach dress
This dress is so comfortable and easy to wear! The material is lightweight and breathable, but not too thin. I'm 5'2 and the dress is not too long on me. I love it so I bought another!
This fit perfect! For a family picnic, or movie, or shopping, anything!
I bought this in red for an event, loved it so much I bought it in 4 more colors! Good quality for the price. Washed, line dried, kept it's shape. Win, win, win.

The fit is flattering without being too tight, and the cut is both simple and elegant. It has just the right amount of stretch to move with you, but it doesn’t lose its shape, even after multiple wears. The dress is versatile enough to dress up with accessories for a night out or keep casual for a more laid-back look.

评论概述: Cute style, nice fit but fabric is too thin
评论详情: I loved the style and fit of this dress. It's too bad the fabric is so thin. You can see the pattern of my lace underwear through the dress even with a slip.
I'm curvy and this looks quite good on my 5'5" frame. Good price for what you get. 10/10

I really like the style and think this would look great on people who are very evenly proportioned. I am a size S on my lower body and XS on my upper body (5’7” and 125 lbs), so the dress size S fit about as I expected sadly - really flattering from the waist down, but a little too wide through the chest and shoulders, and the sleeves looked a little oversized on my arms. I also really wanted cotton, but for some reason all the Amazon retailers only use synthetic fabrics. This was about half rayon which I didn’t realize - I usually avoid rayon since it doesn’t wash or wear well. The dress didn’t look cheap or poor quality from the initial try-on, but I’m not sure how it would’ve held up long-term had I not decided to return it. Price-wise, it’s ok; I did get it marked down, but probably wouldn’t have paid full price considering the materials. That said, it’s designed and cut well, so I think it’s a decent value if you’re not able to invest in something more substantial and need something quick.

I wore this dress to a wedding, and it was super comfortable and fit well. I'm 5'3 with a slim build and ordered size small. I love the color and the fit, and I think this dress would work for a variety of body types.  The fabric was not thin or flimsy.  I would definitely recommend it.

Love this dress! I bought last minute for a work event, for which it was appropriate and comfortable, and can imagine dressing it up or down with shoes/accessories for a variety of events. Someone even asked if it was a brand name, so I think it looks higher quality than the price point!

I bought this to wear to a wedding…in July…in Dallas.  (Think crazy hot weather!) This dress is effortless!  Super soft.  Drapes nicely (NO unsightly panty lines 🙈).  I’ve worn it to the office and also just to run errands.  Super easy to dress up or dress down.  It washes really well.  I use the Woolite for Dark Colors so that probably helps.  I think it’s one of my favorite purchases of the summer!

评论概述: Fabric is cheap but fit is good
评论详情: I got this on sale, so I’m not too mad at it. The fabric is thicker in front and the back is thinner. So high probability that undergarments will be seen underneath. Love the shape. I am a teacher and this is stylish and practical. Can be dressed up or down easily.

I took this dress to Spain & Morocco and it was perfect - soft/comfy, easy to pack, quick dry when washed in the hotel room, appropriate-for-anything midi length, dress up/down, waist tie that camouflages the tummy, cute side slit!! However after only a few washes it started to pill. I still love it but can’t really dress it up anymore.

评论概述: Perfect dress will get you lots of compliments
评论详情: I have gotten nothing but compliments on this dress! The side tie and ruching hide my "beer belly". I would buy this dress in every color!
Loved the fit. Wore spanx asset shapewear underneath it to help the butt look flattering

I think this is such a cute dress. Great color selection and the fabric feels nice. I ordered a small and it was too big unfortunately. For reference, I’m 5’2 and 105 pounds so it was a little bit too long but I didn’t mind that much. The deal breaker for me was how big the sleeves were and just how baggy the top portion was in general. I think if there was an XS size option it would’ve been perfect!
I get so many compliments when I wear this. It’s so flattering.

Soft quality material, not too thin and not too thick. Im only 5’ 0” and small fits perfectly and isn’t too long. I was afraid the slits would be too high but they are perfect because of how short I am. Love love love this dress

评论概述: Feel like your wearing PJs but look put together
评论详情: I love this dress so much I bought it in 3 colors. It is the perfect dress to throw on when you want to feel super comfortable but look more put together than wearing sweats. If I throw on a necklace I get lots of complements. I’ve even worn the darker colors to the office. Very flattering!
This dress far surpassed my expectations!  The material, the color, the style are all top-tier.  The fit is beautiful, very flattering.  Plan to buy another color.
I am a plus size Mom.  This dress is comfy & looks nice. I could not be more happy with this purchase!
Look nice on and fit nice

Purchased this to wear to a friend's "beach cocktail" themed wedding. Paired with some dressy slide sandals & it looked really cute! Received so many compliments. :) Had the perfect amount of stretch so it wasn't loose or tight.  I'm 5'6 1/2" and 200 lbs....Thick thigh and chest area. I ordered large and it fit great.
I love the cross tie at the mid section it’s soft and comfortable, great mid length. It’s perfect for hiding the mommy tummy .

The quality was nice. The color was pretty. The only thing I’m disappointed in is that the gathering in the front is just two flaps you tie together so you don’t get the same look as pictured. Fabric is also a bit see through.

评论概述: Love it for work or travel
评论详情: I'm normally a small/medium but I don't like anything "clingy" so I went with a large. I have this dress in black and orange. LOVE them both. With the tie, you can size up.

This is a perfect elegant look for work or church or a social event! I love the side tie~ The material is thin so I recommend a slip but that doesn't bother me living in Florida where it is hot nine months out of the year.
Super cute and comfortable. Fit great and washed well.
This dress is true to size. Stunning dress for the price
This blue is just beautiful. I'm a little concerned about the jersey stretching. It also fits big so buy a size down.
The cinched waist is very flattering, it provides enough coverage for office/business casual wear and is very comfortable.
It's a nice dress but shrunk with drying. If you want a loser fit, size up.
Very comfortable dress!
Great length (5'7", XL), and slimming. Always get compliments.
Guys I weigh damn near 200 pounds, and this dress made me feel so pretty and gorgeous and like I didn’t even need shapewear. Perfect for looking a little modest on a super hot summer day.
Liked the quality and fabric!  However, didn’t the length of the dress.
Lightweight, comfortable fit and still flattering.  Can be casual or dressy.  My new favorite dress.
Well if you want to show your shape like most do, this is for you. not good for church. Really cute though!

The fabric of this dress was thinner than I expected, but the aqua color is pretty. I purchased it as a work dress and for me, it wasn’t appropriate for the office. However, it could be paired over a nude slip or worn casually.
